doc:
Valarie Pettiford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valarie_Pettiford 0 Valarie Pettiford (born July 8, 1960) is an American stage and television actress, dancer, and jazz singer. She received a Tony nomination for her role in the broadway production Fosse. She is also known for her role as "Big Dee Dee" Thorne on the UPN sitcom Half Half. Valarie_Pettiford ( born July_8_,_1960 ) is an_American_stage_and_television_actress , dancer , and jazz_singer . She received a_Tony_nomination for her_role in the_broadway_production_Fosse . She is_also_known for her_role as "_Big_Dee_Dee_"_Thorne on the_UPN_sitcom_Half_ .
